page.title: 05A Killamarsh Shopper
page.content: We walked down to Bridge Street in Killamarsh where most of our shops are and asked a middle-aged lady shopper if she would talk to us about shopping in Killamarsh. She told us that shopping in Killamarsh was very good because ther was plenty of choice, because the prices were quite reasonable and because she didn't have far to walk home with the heavy shopping. She thought that the bus services in Killamarsh weren't very good for shoppers who had to come a long way because they didn't run often enough. She shops about once every day for the odd thing but has a 'big shop' every Saturday. She doesn't buy expensive things in Killamarsh such as a new television or a new suite because there isn't enough choice and the prices are too high. She goes to Sheffield fot things like that.
